description: Provide seamless access to Chainlink's decentralized oracle network services including real-time price feeds, verifiable randomness, cross-chain interoperability, automation, and proof of reserve. Enable AI developers to integrate reliable blockchain data and execute custom off-chain functions effortlessly. Simplify building decentralized finance, gaming, and cross-chain applications with comprehensive Chainlink ecosystem tools.

chainlinkApiKey.description: Chainlink API key for premium features

capabilities.name: get_price_feed
capabilities.description: Get the latest price data for a specific trading pair from Chainlink Data Feeds. Returns current price, last update time, and round information.

capabilities.name: get_price_feeds_batch
capabilities.description: Get price data for multiple trading pairs at once. More efficient than individual requests.

capabilities.name: list_available_feeds
capabilities.description: List all available price feeds on a specific network. Shows supported trading pairs and their contract addresses.

capabilities.name: search_feeds
capabilities.description: Search for price feeds by symbol, description, or category. Useful for discovering available data sources.

capabilities.name: get_feed_metadata
capabilities.description: Get detailed metadata about a specific price feed including update frequency, data sources, and reliability metrics.

capabilities.name: get_round_data
capabilities.description: Get historical price data for specific rounds. Useful for analyzing price movements and feed update patterns.

capabilities.name: deploy_function
capabilities.description: Deploy a new Chainlink Function with custom JavaScript code. Functions can fetch external data and perform custom computations off-chain.

capabilities.name: call_function
capabilities.description: Execute a deployed Chainlink Function with specified arguments. Returns a request ID to track execution.

capabilities.name: get_function_result
capabilities.description: Get the result of a Chainlink Function execution. Returns the computed result or error if execution failed.

capabilities.name: list_user_functions
capabilities.description: List all Chainlink Functions deployed by the user. Shows function details, status, and usage statistics.

capabilities.name: estimate_function_cost
capabilities.description: Estimate the cost of executing a Chainlink Function including compute costs and gas fees.

capabilities.name: create_automation
capabilities.description: Create a new Chainlink Automation job to automatically execute smart contract functions based on time or custom conditions.

capabilities.name: list_automations
capabilities.description: List all active Chainlink Automation jobs. Shows status, execution history, and configuration details.

capabilities.name: get_automation_status
capabilities.description: Get detailed status and execution history for a specific automation job.

capabilities.name: pause_automation
capabilities.description: Pause a running automation job. Can be resumed later without losing configuration.

capabilities.name: resume_automation
capabilities.description: Resume a paused automation job. Will continue executing based on original configuration.

capabilities.name: cancel_automation
capabilities.description: Cancel an automation job permanently. This action cannot be undone.

capabilities.name: request_random_words
capabilities.description: Request cryptographically secure random numbers from Chainlink VRF. Returns a request ID for tracking.

capabilities.name: get_random_result
capabilities.description: Get the random numbers for a completed VRF request. Returns the randomness along with fulfillment details.

capabilities.name: verify_randomness
capabilities.description: Verify the cryptographic proof of a VRF result. Ensures the randomness is genuine and tamper-proof.

capabilities.name: get_vrf_config
capabilities.description: Get VRF configuration details for a network including key hashes, gas lanes, and pricing.

capabilities.name: estimate_vrf_cost
capabilities.description: Estimate the total cost for a VRF request including LINK premium and gas fees.

capabilities.name: send_cross_chain_message
capabilities.description: Send a message from one blockchain to another using Chainlink CCIP. Supports arbitrary data transfer.

capabilities.name: transfer_tokens_cross_chain
capabilities.description: Transfer tokens from one blockchain to another using Chainlink CCIP. Supports various token standards.

capabilities.name: get_message_status
capabilities.description: Check the status of a cross-chain message or token transfer. Returns delivery confirmation and details.

capabilities.name: list_supported_networks
capabilities.description: List all blockchain networks supported by Chainlink CCIP with their configurations and capabilities.

capabilities.name: estimate_ccip_fees
capabilities.description: Estimate the cost of sending messages or transferring tokens via CCIP between specific networks.

capabilities.name: get_proof_of_reserve
capabilities.description: Get the latest proof of reserve data for a specific asset. Shows total supply, backing assets, and collateralization ratio.

capabilities.name: verify_reserve_proof
capabilities.description: Verify the cryptographic proof for reserve attestations. Ensures data integrity and authenticity.

capabilities.name: list_supported_assets
capabilities.description: List all assets with available Proof of Reserve feeds. Shows asset details and data availability.

capabilities.name: get_reserve_history
capabilities.description: Get historical reserve data for an asset. Shows reserve levels over time and collateralization trends.
